module.name: PIN Sets
module.description: Allow creation of lists of PINs (numbers for passwords) that can be used by other modules (eg, trunks).
module.changelog: *1.1* Add naftali5's fix for pinsets being lost when routes are moved. *1.0.12* Add he_IL translation *1.0.11* Stop potential error where a random pinset is appearing when creating a new trunk
